Datasets

Previous topic

We consider that scientific data should be made available as much as possible. Do not hesitate to contact us if you want to access one the datasets used or described in our publications.

In particular,

  • for accessing DRAKKAR simulation output, please contact Bernard Barnier and Jean-Marc Molines
  • for accessing DRAKKAR Forcing Sets, please contact Bernard Barnier and Jean-Marc Molines
  • for accessing NATL60 model simulation output, please visit NATL60 website and contact J. Le Sommer
  • for accessing our climatology of Antarctic Iceberg Melt, please visit Nacho Merinoâ€™s website or contact J. Le Sommer
  • for accessing the OCCIPUT ensemble simulation outputs, please contact Thierry Penduff
